ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: from the evil of the insidious whisperer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: From the evil of him who breathes temptations into the minds of men,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: from the mischief of the whispering, elusive prompter who returns again and again,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: against the evil of the temptations of the satans,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “From the evil of the one who instils evil thoughts in the hearts – and stays hidden.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: From the evil of the whisperer who withdraws."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: From the evil of the whisperings of the slinking (Shaitan),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: from the evil of the slinking whisperer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: From the evil of the sneaking whisperer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: from the mischief of every sneaking whis-perer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: From the evil of the sneaking whisperer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: from the evil of the sneaky tempter
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: From the mischief of the Whisperer (of Evil), who withdraws (after his whisper),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: From the evil of the whisperer (devil who whispers evil in the hearts of men) who withdraws (from his whispering in one's heart after one remembers Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: from the evil of the slinking whisperer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: From the evil of the sneaky whisperer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [114:4] from the evil of the slinking whisperer, Satan — he is referred to by the name of the action [waswasa] on account of his repeated engaging in it — who slinks [away] and recoils from the heart whenever God is mentioned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (From the evil of the sneaking whisperer) i.e. Satan who runs away and hides himself whenever Allah is mentioned,
